mapper.insert:
insert into ceap.tb_job(s_id, cp_id, j_salary, di_id, pro_id, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.cpId}, #{entity.jSalary}, #{entity.diId}, #{entity.proId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})

insert into ceap.tb_job(s_id, cp_id, j_salary, di_id, pro_id, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.cpId}, #{entity.jSalary}, #{entity.diId}, #{entity.proId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})
on duplicate key update s_id = values(s_id) , cp_id = values(cp_id) , j_salary = values(j_salary) , di_id = values(di_id) , pro_id = values(pro_id) , create_time = values(create_time) , modify_time = values(modify_time) , deleted = values(deleted)
